Title: 🔁 The Tulkarm Brigade has denied responsibility for yesterday’s ...
Description: Forwarded From AMK MappingThe Tulkarm Brigade has denied responsibility for yesterday’s Tel Aviv bus bombings, contradicting claims made by several sources. The Tulkarm brigade used to be subordinated under the Al-Quds brigades (the armed wing of the Palestinian Islamic Jihad), but became its own armed group in 2022. It is based in the West Bank city of Tulkarm. They are currently engaged in clashes with Israeli special forces who are attempting to clear the Tulkarm Refugee camp and the Nour Shams refugee camp.

Title: ↩️🖼 🇨🇩🇷🇼⚡- M23 have reopened their northern front, launching...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇨🇩🇷🇼⚡- The DR Congo military, FARDC, and police force have begun fleeing from Uvira, South Kivu region, eastern DR Congo. 🇨🇩🇷🇼⚡- M23 have reopened their northern front, launching forward operations at several towns and cities over the past 24 hours - North Kivu direction, eastern DR Congo.M23 have advanced along the N2 highway, capturing Wimbi. Violent clashes have been ongoing south of Kitsambiro for over 12 hours. M23 have so far failed in entering the large town. DR Congo military sources say the M23 have outflanked them, likely from the west, and have begun attacking Buliba. The loss of Buliba will cut the N2 supply route to Kitsambiro. Unlike the South Kivu direction, where the FARDC have completely collapsed, in the North Kivu direction DR Congo have been responding with strong resistance.

Title: ↩️🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 - Kurakhovo direction update: Russian forces have b...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: Photo 🇷🇺🇺🇦 - Kurakhovo direction update:Russian forces have begun clearing the Kurakhovo pocket, however reports of the pocket being completely cleared are false. A source from the Russian 68th Tank Brigade tells Rerum Novarum that they are still waiting along the outskirts of Dachnoe, as small Ukrainian pockets remain in the trenches and tree-lines west of the town.Front-line sources, from Ukraine and Russia, state that the trapped Ukrainian personnel in the Kurakhovo pocket, west of Dachnoe, might be the infamous and very well experienced Ukrainian 79th Brigade 'Cyborgs'. This report remains unconfirmed at the moment.Reports of Russian forces capturing the entirety of Ulakly are pure fiction. A source from the Russian 38th Brigade, the very unit that's fighting there, tells Rerum Novarum that they just managed to position themselves in the southern outskirts of the town.Russian forces stormed Konstantinopol from the south early morning, creating a landing platform in the southeast of the town. Russian forces have also successfully crossed the Volcha river and are pressuring the Ukrainian force in the town from the north too.In Andreevka, battles continue in the west of the town. 80% of the large town is under Russian control, but sources tell Rerum Novarum that advancing here has become difficult as Ukrainian forces have destroyed most infrastructure, including the houses. Russian units are instead focusing on the large trench network north of the town.

This operation is being carried out at this time. We have geolocated recent footage to 13.60358, 25.33785, the Last Prophet Mosque. Reports also confirm the advance, as violent clashes are reported at Livestock Market.The Sudanese Armed Forces managed to prevent the RSF from advancing towards the airport and the center of the city.

SAF also advanced along Nile… 🇸🇩🇺🇦⚡- Several Sudanese military journalists accuse Ukraine of providing drones to the Rapid Support Forces.Note, Ukraine's GUR initially backed the Sudanese government against the Rapid Support Forces, which used to work with the Wagner Group (primarily through Idris Barkawi and the Chad-based FACT forces). Which has been the case, Russia and Sudan, via Iran, have vastly improved relations, which has likely caused Ukraine to switch sides.

Rapid Support Forces, RSF, now hold only the Industrial Center and Kafouri districts in northern Khartoum.SAF also advanced along Nile Street in Khartoum Central (3), capturing Sudan's Central Bank. The advance puts RSF on Tuti Island at risk of complete encirclement, as the SAF are now less than 850 meters from the Tuti Bridge.

Title: ↩️🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces entered the first few houses of No...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡️- Russian forces have captured Kotlino (Pokrovsk direction.) Some pro-Russian outlets claim that Russian troops have advanced as far in this sector as the various farms in the north- although we could not confirm this. We have left it in the gray zone. 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces entered the first few houses of Novoaleksandrovka, Pokrovsk direction.Russian troops also captured one of the last remaining fortifications before the Dnepr region, located just north of Uspenovka.

Title: ↩️🖼 🇾🇪⚡- Fierce clashes between Ansarullah and Yemen's Coaliti...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇾🇪⚡- Ansarullah have captured al-Jabara from the Saudi-backed Coalition Forces - Ad-Dali direction, Yemen. This marks the first significant change along the frontline in this direction in years. The large town, which fell overnight, had been under siege… 🇾🇪⚡- Fierce clashes between Ansarullah and Yemen's Coalition Forces. Ansarullah launched attacks against west of Maqbanah and south of Hajdah - Taizz direction, Yemen.
